channel.title: Runserver error
channel.description: when i try to run my server i get this error exception in thread "main" java.lang.arrayindexoutofboundsexception: 16 at itemhandler.loaditemlist(itemhandler.java:313) at itemhandler.(initit)(itemhandler.java:40) at server.main.java: 28) does any1 know how to fix it. i got it when i added my dragon arrows into item.cfg[br][size=1]Posted on: October 15, 2007, 11:46:12 AM[/size][hr]will some1 please please please answer i need help on this bad!!!!

item.title: Runserver error
item.dc:creator: @Cryme_Time Cryme Time
item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

Remove what you just added in the .cfg file you editted.
That will fix your problem, you did something wrong while editting it.

Read full topic
